Rwanda vs Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Rwanda 2-2 Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:29

Umukino urangiye ibihugu byombi binganya

Amavubi yatsindiwe na Jacques Tuyisenge ku munota wa 10 na 45 naho Repubulika ya Centrafrique itsindirwa na Habib Habibou ku munota wa 27 na Geofrey Kondogbia ku munota wa 94

17:25

Igitego cya Centrafrique

Ku makosa ya Emmanuel Imanishimwe urengeje umupira muri Koruneri, itewe neza na David Manga ayishyira ku mutwe wa Kondogbia atsindira igihugu cye cyo kunganya.

17:23

Hongeweho iminota ine y'inyongera

Stade yose yahagurutse abantu bararirimba bati, Turate Rwanda yacu itatse inema... Bati, Uragahorana ishya... Ibyishimo ni byinshi ku bafana

17:22

90' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rw'Amavubi

Jacques Tuyisenge watsinze ibitego bibiri asimbuwe na Iranzi Jean Claude wa APR FC

17:22

Abanyamakuru bafannye Amavubi biratinda

17:17

Ibyishimo byari byose kuri Tuyisenge Jacques

17:15

84' Amavubi y'u Rwanda abonye ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere muri uyu mukino

Nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga asimbuye, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo ku ikosa akoreye Geofrey Kondogbia

17:14

83' Amavubi arasimbuje yongera imbaraga mu busatirizi

Nyuma yo gukina umukino wa mbere mu Amavubi kuva mu 2015, Buteera Andrew, asimbuwe na rutahizamu wa Tersana FC yo mu Misiri Danny Usengimana, bivuga ko Bizimana Djihad ahita asubira gukina hagati mu kibuga.

17:12

80' Gusimbuza kwa gatatu ku ruhande rwa Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Yapende Quintin afashe umwanya wa Foxi Kathevoama wari wagoye abakinnyi bo hagati b'Amavubi

17:06

75' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo ihawe Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Emmanuel Imanishimwe bita Mangwende akorewe ikosa aryama hasi. Youga Amoss Christopher ntabwo abyishimiye ashaka kumuhagurutsa ku ngufu bimuviramo guhabwa ikarita y'umuhondo kubera amahane

17:04

72' Gusimbura ku ruhande rw'Amavubi

Nyuma y'iminota myinshi Muhadjiri Hakizimana yamaze agerageza ariko ntatange umusaruro unogeye abatoza asimbujwe Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, bivuga ko Bizimana Djihad agiye gukina mu basatira naho Sefu akajya mu kibuga hagati

17:02

68' Abdul Rwatubyaye atabaye Amavubi

Foxi Kethevoama ahinduye umupira usanga rutahizamu Habibou imbere y'izamu atera mu izamu ariko Abdul Rwatubyaye araryama awukuramo. Habonetse Koruneri ariko ntacyo ibyaye.

16:59

67' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Umukinnyi wo hagati Vivien Mabide ahaye umwanya rutahizamu Louis Mafouta bagamije gukomeza gusatira

16:59

Uko igitego cy'Amavubi cya kabiri cyinjiye mu rushundura

16:52

61' Bizimana Djihad ateye ishoti rikubita igiti cy'izamu

Muhadjiri Hakizimana afashe umupira acenga abakinnyi babiri ba Repubulika ya Centrafrique aryohereza abafana aha umupira mwishywa we Bizimana Djihad atera ishoti rikomeye ariko umupira ufata igiti cy'izamu ugaruka mu kibuga

16:50

58' Mashami ahagurukije abakinnyi batanu b'Amavubi ngo bajye kwishyushya

Nyuma yo kubona uko iminota ya mbere y'igice cya kabiri irangiye, Mashami Vincent ahagurukije abakinnyi batanu ngo bajye kwishyushya. Barimo Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Yannick Mukunzi, Iranzi Jean Claude, Danny Usengimana na Mico Justin.

16:46

55' Geoffrey Kondogbia ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru bari muri Stade Huye batunguwe n'umusaruro uri hasi wa Geoffrey Kondogbia uri gukina hagati. N'umupira acomekewe na Foxi ari imbere y'izamu awuteye ku ruhande rw'izamu rya Kimenyi Yves

16:41

49 Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Umutoza ahisemo gusimbuza, akuramo Fred Nimani wakinaga ku ruhande asatira azana rutahizamu David Manga ngo yongere imbaraga mu busatirizi

16:40

Wadukurikira na kuri Twitter

Abasifuzi bakomoka muri Mali

Abasifuzi bagiye kuyobora umukino ni: Babou Traore, Boba Yamboliba, Drissa Kamory Niare n'umusifuzi wa kane Osmane Sidibe bakomoka muri Mali

— IGIHE (@IGIHE) November 18, 2018


16:37

46' Amavubi ahushije igitego cyashoboraga kuba icya gatatu

Meddie Kagere ugaragaza inyota yo gutsinda igitego nawe ahushije uburyo bwari bwabazwe kuri Koruneri itewe na Bizimana Djihad awushyira ku mutwe wa Manzi Thierry nawe awugeza kuri Kagere ariko atera hejuru y'izamu

16:35

Igice cya kabiri gitangijwe na Repubulika ya Centrafrique

Rutahizamu Habib Habibou niwe utangije igice cya kabiri cy'uyu mukino uri kubera kuri stade Huye, aho amakipe yombi nta n'imwe ifite icyizere cyo kubona itike y'igikombe cya Afurika.

16:34

Abayobozi bari inyuma y'Ikipe y'Igihugu

Perezida wa Sena, Bernard Makuza, ni umwe mu bayobozi bakuru b'igihugu bitabiriye uyu mukino. N'ubusanzwe akunda umupira dore ko anawukina mu Ikipe y'abayobozi

16:31

Ibitekerezo bya bamwe ku gice cya mbere!

Omborenga's pass was beautiful.

— Richard Kwizera (@Muzungu4) November 18, 2018




16:25

Igice cya mbere kirangiye u Rwanda ruyoboye

Abanyarwanda bari muri stade Huye baragaragaza ibyishimo nyuma yo gutsinda ibitego bibiri mu gice cya mbere mu mukino w'amarushanwa ya CAF

16:18

45' Igitego cya kabiri cy'u Rwanda

Jacques Tuyisenge atsindiye Amavubi igitego cya kabiri ku makosa y'umunyezamu wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique ugonganye na Meddie Kagere ananirwa gufata umupira usanga Tuyisenge aho yari ahagaze hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina atsinda igitego cya kabiri n'akaguru k'ibumoso

16:15

42' Umutoza wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique ntabwo yishimiye uko ikipe ye iri kwitwara

Umutoza HervÃƒÂ© Lougoundji yamaze guhagurutsa abakinnyi babiri; Thibaut Ban na Ndombe Sadack ngo bajye kwishyushya kuko atishimiye uko abakinnyi be basatira bari kwitwara

Amwe mu mafoto y'abatoza b'amakipe yombi mbere y'umukino:

16:09

Muhadjiri Hakizimana ntabwo ari mu bihe byiza

Rutahizamu w'ikipe ya APR FC Muhadjiri Hakizimana yahinduriwe umwanya asanzwe akinaho, ari gukinishwa ku ruhande rw'ibumoso asatira ariko yagowe cyane na myugariro w'iburyo wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique Ngam Ngam Cyr uri gutuma atakaza imipira myinshi

16:04

27Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ Habib atsinze igitego cyo kwishyura

27Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ Habib Habibou wa Centrafrique yishyuye igitego ku mupira mwiza uhinduwe ku ruhande rwÃ¢â‚¬â„¢iburyo, usanga Habib mu rubuga rwÃ¢â‚¬â„¢amahina ahita awuterana abasore bÃ¢â‚¬â„¢inyuma bÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Amavubi.

15:56

Ikirere kirijimye kuko imvura irahise

15:54

21' Koruneri ya mbere muri uyu mukino

Ba myugariro ba Repubulika ya Centrafrique bari guhura n'akazi katoroshye. Butera acomekeye umupira Kagere ariko urenzwa na Nzimbori Brice haboneka Koruneri itewe na Bizimana Djihad ariko Rwatubyaye ahusha umutwe washoboraga kubyara igitego cya kabiri

15:50

19' Amavubi ni yo yihariye umupira

Mu kibuga hagati, Ikipe y'Igihugu, Amavubi, iri guhanahana umupira kurusha Centrafrique ndetse amaze kubona ubundi buryo bw'igitego ndetse na Coup franc imbere y'urubuga rw'amahina. Ba rutahizamu Jacques Tuyisenge na Kagere Meddie ni bo bayoboye

15:48

17' Amavubi akomeje gusatira

Bizimana Djihad acomekeye umupira mwiza Kagere Meddie akorerwa ikosa na myugariro Anzite Touadere haboneka Coup franc ariko Muhadjiri Hakizimana atera hejuru y'izamu

15:43

12' Amavubi afunguye amazamu

Jacques Tuyisenge ni we ufunguye amazamu ku ruhande rw'Ikipe y'Igihugu Amavubi. Ni ku mupira mwiza uhinduwe na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ugera kuri Ombolenga Fitina ku ruhande rw'iburyo nawe atazuyaje awuha rutahizamu Jacques Tuyisenge ukina muri Gor Mahia FC yo muri Kenya wari mu rubuga rw'amahina afungura amazamu.

15:37

Uko umukino uherutse wagenze

Tariki 11 Kamena 2017 nibwo hakinwe umukino ubanza wahuje Centrafrique n'Amavubi y'u Rwanda. Wabereye mu Mujyi wa Bangui urangira mu byishimo by'icyo gihugu cyatsinze Amavubi 2-1. Igitego cy'impozamarira cy'u Rwanda cyatsinzwe na rutahizamu Sugira Ernest icyo gihe wakinaga muri AS Vita Club yo muri RDC

15:36

Umukinnyi wo kwitega

Geoffrey Kondogbia ukinira Valence yo muri Espagne, ni umwe mu bakinnyi abanyarwanda baza kwitega kuri uyu mukino kubera ubuhanga bwe. Ni we Kapiteni wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique

15:33

Umukino utangijwe n'umusifuzi Babou Traore

Umukino utangijwe n'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda, kuri rutahizamu Meddie Kagere

15:32

Abasifuzi bakomoka muri Mali

Abasifuzi bagiye kuyobora umukino ni: Babou Traore, Boba Yamboliba, Drissa Kamory Niare n'umusifuzi wa kane Osmane Sidibe bakomoka muri Mali

15:31

Butera yongeye kubanza mu kibuga

Umutoza Mashami Vincent yagiriye icyizere umukinnyi wo hagati wa APR FC, Buteera Andrew, waherukaga kubanza mu kibuga mu ikipe yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢igihugu mu myaka itatu ishize, mu mpeshyi ya 2015 kubera ibibazo byÃ¢â‚¬â„¢imvune.

15:30

Amakipe yombi ari mu itsinda H

Ni umukino wa gatanu wo mu itsinda Ã¢â‚¬ËœHÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ mu rugendo rwo gushaka itike yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢igikombe cya Afurika kizabera muri Cameroun mu 2019 uhuza Amavubi yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢u Rwanda nÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ikipe yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢igihugu ya Repubulika ya Centrafrique.

15:27

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku mpande zombi

Rwanda: Kimenyi Yves, Ombolenga Fitina, Emmanuel Imanishimwe, Abdul Rwatubyaye, Manzi Thierry, Buteera Andrew, Bizimana Djihad, Ally Niyonzima, Meddie Kagere, Jacques Tuyisenge na Muhadjiri Hakizimana.


Centrafrique: Lambert Geoffrey Didace, Ngam Ngam Saint Cyr, Eloge Ethisset Enza, Vivien Madibe, Foxi Kathevoama, Anzite Clovis Touadere, Brice Nzimbori, Fred Nimani, Geoffrey Kondogbia, Habib Habibou, na Yoga Amos Christopher

15:19

Imvura ntiyoroshye


Kuri Stade ya Huye, abakinnyi barabura iminota mike ngo basohoke mu rwambariro binjire mu kibuga. Hagati aho, imvura imeze nabi ku buryo gusa ntiributume umukino utaba uko byagenda kose

15:16
